A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thought this was great. Farr better than VII. Hard to wright without spoilers but killed the 2 stupid discussions going on externally. Who is snoke\, who are Reys parents. Stupid inconsequential  questions that are now resolved done and dusted. A few continuity problems and not enough detail on some sub plots. This movie could have easily been another 30min to sort the problems. If I view this movie through my imaginary 12 year old eyes (it's made for 12 year olds remember) it's great. Some of the humor falls short but most brings a laugh from the audience. Overall I had fun and enjoyed the movie as someone who saw the original Star Wars as a 12 year old I approve of this movie and will go and see it again.
